11.content: You select Sonic X. Who do you want to get pregnant?

113.content: Cream has sex and gets pregnant. Who does she sleep with?
113.title: Cream the  Rabbit

choices: Cream is happy, but also shocked
1131.content:
Cream was lying in her bed, naked, thinking about last night. She had just had sex with Chris. She knew that they were both under age but the moment was absolutely perfect. They bumped into each other in Cream's room because Chris was doing chores and his chore was to get laundry. Cream was there because she was playing with her toys. They met each other's eyes and Chris started playing with her dress. She said to excuse her for a moment and when she came back out, she was naked. Chris saw this and he got a boner. Cream sat on him and put her arms around Chris and looked at him seductively. Chris picked her up in his arms and put her on her bed and took his pants off. One thing led then led to another. Cream smiled at the memory. 'It's a shame Chris had to go to school,' she thought. 'We will probably continue this,' she thought and she smiled at the thought.
A couple of weeks later
Cream was at the doctors. She wasn't feeling good, and decided to find out what was wrong. Plus, her feeling sick was messing up her love time with Chris. She saw her doctor and had tests performed on her. The doctor came back with a weird look on his face.
"What's wrong doctor?" Cream asked.
"Ms. Cream, I don't know how to say this, but I guess congratulations are in order. Ms. Cream your... pregnant.
What is Cream's reaction?
1131.title: Chris

11311.content:
"Oh, thankyou," said Cream.
"I'll give you time to think on this. Please see me in 3 weeks, okay?" asked the doctor.
"Okay," replied Cream. She walked out of the doctor's office and headed home. When she was half way home, she looked down at her stomach. She then put her hand on it and started rubbing it. 'Wow, 'she thought. 'I have a baby in there.' She found a bench and sat down. She had all these questions running through her head. 'What will the others think? What will my mom think when we go back to Mobius? What will Chris think? Should I even tell Chris?'
Should she tell Chris?
11311.title: Cream is happy, but also shocked

113111.content:
When Cream got home, she found Chris in the living room and on the computer. She went up to him and said,"Um, Chris? Could I see you for a moment in private?"
"Sure," he replied with a look on his face that made Cream think she's calling him for another reason. They went to Cream's room and as they got in, Cream locked the door.
"So, what did you want me for?" asked Chris.
"Umm, Chris I'm pregnant with your child."
What is Chris's reaction?
113111.title: Yes, she tells Chirs

121.content:
Courtney and Duncan began to have the need of children in their 19's. They were married 1 year ago. They felt all alone. Duncan began to talk to Courtney to have more than 2 babies. Courtney agreed.

They make out and no luck until September 12, 2011, when Courtney squealed with excitement. She told Duncan about it. Duncan was also happy about it.

Soon Courtney had a bigger belly with the baby(ies). Soon they went to the doctors and the doctors confirmed Courtney was indeed pregnant. But how much you say. Well, I tell you. She is going to give birth to 25 babies.

I forgot to mention there are unlimited babies birth.

So what month to skip.
121.title: Courtney
